blog.application.name=部落格 ### Missing: blog.archive.paneltitle = Blog Archive ### Missing: blog.archive.pagetitle = Archive blog.archive.noarticle = 目前沒有文章... blog.archive.postsyear = {0} 部落格文章 blog.archive.unpublished = (尚未發佈) blog.archive.hidden = (隱藏) blog.archive.noarticlesyear = 本年沒有文章... blog.archive.postsfor = 部落格文章 blog.archive.noarticlesmonth = 本月沒有文章... blog.code.blogsheet = 部落格 sheet blog.code.sheetexplanation = 此 sheet 用來顯示部落格文件 blog.code.notblog = 這不是一個部落格文件! blog.code.published = 此部落格文章尚未發佈 blog.code.hidden = 此部落格文章已隱藏 blog.code.notpublished = 此部落格文章尚未發佈. 發佈它! blog.code.madevisible = 公開它 blog.code.hid = 隱藏項目 blog.code.makevisible = 其他使用者看不到這篇部落格文章. 公開它. blog.code.hide = 讓其他使用者看不到這篇部落格文章 ### Missing: blog.code.loading = Loading... ### Missing: blog.code.failedToChangeBlogPostVisibility = Failed to change blog post visibility. blog.code.editpost = 編輯此部落格文章 blog.code.deletepost = 刪除此部落格文章 blog.code.readpost = 讀取所有項目 blog.code.postedby = 發佈者 blog.code.createdby = 建立者 blog.code.modifiedby = 修改者 blog.code.comments = 評論 blog.code.permalink = 永久鏈結 blog.code.categories = 類別: blog.code.in = 在 blog.code.previousweek = 上一週 blog.code.nextweek = 下一週 blog.code.previousmonth = 上個月 blog.code.nextmonth = 下個月 blog.code.olderposts = 更舊的文章 blog.code.newerposts = 更新的文章 ### Missing: blog.code.blogcategories = Blog categories ### Missing: blog.code.description.category = Most recent blog posts in the {0} category ### Missing: blog.code.description.space = Most recent blog posts in the {0} space ### Missing: blog.code.description.wiki = Most recent blog posts in the wiki ### Missing: blog.code.title = Blog ### Missing: blog.code.warning = Warning: blog.sheet.notpost = 這不是部落格文章 blog.sheet.category = 類別: blog.sheet.summary = 摘要 (非必填): blog.sheet.content = 內容: blog.sheet.title = 標題: blog.sheet.publicationdate = 此文章發佈於 {0} blog.sheet.hidearticle = 隱藏文章 {0} blog.sheet.notpublished = 此文章尚未發佈 blog.sheet.publish = 發佈 blog.sheet.setdate = 設定發佈日期至: ### Missing: blog.sheet.image=Image ### Missing: blog.sheet.image.info=The image field is used to attach a thumbnail to each blog post. The post thumbnails will be visible only in cases where the blog is configured to use the 'image' layout. ### Missing: blog.sheet.choose_image=Choose an image blog.category.created = 類別 {0} 已新增
